${ModID}:Brightblind.NAME: Brightblind
${ModID}:Brightblind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BurningStudy.NAME: Burning Study
${ModID}:BurningStudy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cryostasis.NAME: Cryostasis
${ModID}:Cryostasis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Darkleech.NAME: Darkleech
${ModID}:Darkleech.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Darkleech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Withervine.NAME: Withervine
${ModID}:Withervine.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Artifact and Block. Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Bees.NAME: BEES!!!
${ModID}:Bees.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Deals 1 additional damage for each *Bug played this turn.

${ModID}:Chromatics.NAME: Chromatics
${ModID}:Chromatics.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard your hand, then ${ModID}:Conjure !M!.

${ModID}:BrellaBounce.NAME: Brella Bounce
${ModID}:BrellaBounce.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Enemies can't create Status cards this turn.

${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.NAME: Lord of the Flies
${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.DESCRIPTION: When your cards ${ModID}:Infest, add an additional *Bug into your hand.
${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When your cards ${ModID}:Infest, add an additional *Bug into your hand.

${ModID}:StylinStrike.NAME: Stylin' Strike
${ModID}:StylinStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL [awesomeIcon] 1+: Upgrade it. NL [awesomeIcon] 3+: It costs 0 this turn.
${ModID}:StylinStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL [awesomeIcon] 1+: Upgrade them. NL [awesomeIcon] 3+: They cost 0 this turn.

${ModID}:BadassMechaSuit.NAME: Badass Mecha Suit
${ModID}:BadassMechaSuit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL [awesomeIcon] 2+: And !${ModID}:m2! Thorns. NL [awesomeIcon] 4+: And !${ModID}:m3! Strength.

${ModID}:PiercingParasol.NAME: Piercing Parasol
${ModID}:PiercingParasol.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Conjure !M!.

${ModID}:PaidInAdvance.NAME: Paid in Advance
${ModID}:PaidInAdvance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, lose [E].

${ModID}:SorcererSupreme.NAME: Sorcerer Supreme
${ModID}:SorcererSupreme.DESCRIPTION: Spells cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Spell, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:TimeCompression.NAME: Time Compression
${ModID}:TimeCompression.DESCRIPTION: End your turn and take an additional one, NL in which you gain no [E] and Block is not removed.

${ModID}:InResponse.NAME: In Response...
${ModID}:InResponse.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Conjure !M!. NL Whenever you play a Spell, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:CoolMagnet.NAME: Cool Magnet!
${ModID}:CoolMagnet.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:FinalForm.NAME: This Isn't Even My...
${ModID}:FinalForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL [awesomeIcon] 1: Each turn, gain [E]. NL [awesomeIcon] 3: Each turn, draw 2 cards. NL [awesomeIcon] 5: Each turn, foes lose 15 HP. NL [awesomeIcon] 10: Cards are played twice.

${ModID}:Bug.NAME: Bug
${ModID}:Bug.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SavedByTheBell.NAME: Saved by the Bell
${ModID}:SavedByTheBell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Put 2 *Curse *of *the *Bells on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:SavedByTheBell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Put 2 *Curse *of *the *Bells on top of your draw pile.
